snippet.title: NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM for Smartphones Promo Video
snippet.description:
The first installment of the Ultimate Ninja Storm series, which has sold over 20 million units, is now available on smartphones! 

Experience immersive battles using a variety of dynamic and powerful ninjutsu with ultra-anime expressions! 
Relive the origins of Naruto's ninja way through encounters with friends, battles with formidable enemies, and farewells with comrades!

Experience Naruto's childhood story!
And enjoy heated battles using characters from the childhood arc! 

==============
【Official Website】
https://naruto-storm-mobile.bn-ent.net/en

【Download here!】
https://bnent.jp/ns-youtube-pv-en/
 
『NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM』
(C)2002 MASASHI KISHIMOTO
(C)Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.
==============
